document_data.mainbody:
Belintholme was a small island located off of the southeastern coast of Evermeet on the Trackless Sea.
The island sat roughly  southeast off of the southern tip of Evermeet.
Belintholme was a forested island that was roughly circular in shape. It was the largest of the islands found off the nearby coast of Evermeet. Several smaller unnamed islands sat off of Belintholmes northeast coast.
